title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, March 28, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of novelist Lauren Weisberger (1977), who fictionalized her time working at Vogue magazine in the book, “The Devil Wears Prada.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of novelist Lauren Weisberger (1977), who fictionalized her time working at Vogue magazine in the book, “The Devil Wears Prada.”
